movies.title: Shutter Island
movies.description: When U.S. Marshal Teddy Daniels (DiCaprio) arrives at the asylum for the criminally insane on Shutter Island, what starts as a routine investigation quickly takes a sinister turn.

movies.title: Fight Club
movies.description: Sick of his dead end, white bread existence, Jack encounters an intriguing stranger who alters his relationship with reality.
